extensionPoints.description: Define conceptsets part of a conceptset group

MD, Surgical Procedures Performed Outsid.nonCodedConceptName: MD, Non-Coded Procedures performed outside AMH

defaults.PE, General examination: Well developed female / male in no acute distress
defaults.PE, HEENT examination: Pupils equal, regular, reactive to light and accomodation, normal extraocular muscles, normocephalic, normal dentition, clear throat, normal neck motion, no jugular vien distension
defaults.PE, Chest examination: Clear lung bilaterally to auscultation and percussion, normal chest wall motion
defaults.PE, Heart examination: Normal S1 & S2, no murmurs, intact pulses
defaults.PE, Abdomen examination: Soft, no hepatosplenomegaly, no tenderness, no mass
defaults.PE, Extremities examination: No clubbing, cyanosis or edema, normal joints with full range of motion
defaults.PE, Neurologic examination: Cranial nerves intact, normal muscular deep tendon reflexes, muscle power intact, sensation intact throughout, gait intact, mental status intact
